# Tables that are back to back with content in between

| Column 1 | Column 2 | Column 3 |
|----------|----------|----------|
| foo      | bar      | blob     |
| baz      | qux      | trust    |
| quux     | quuz     | glob     |
# Table 2 without Pipe at Start and End
| Column 1 | Column 2 | Column 3 |
| -------- | -------- | -------- |
bar | baz | baq
foo | bar | bun
